overview: This film is a psychic documentary that uses "Onmyoji" as its subject and focuses on the real-life stories of inexplicable horrors that occur in this world of universal science. Do curses really exist? Is it possible to put a curse on a third person? Is it possible to kill someone with a curse? See the truth with your own eyes.
tagline: The camera saw it! All of the real record and Onmyoji!
title: The Exorcist's Vengeful Curse
